item.title: MALT Powers Up Adversarial Attacks
item.description: MALT: a novel adversarial attack, is 5x faster than AutoAttack, achieving higher success rates on CIFAR-100 and ImageNet by exploiting mesoscopic almost linearity in neural networks.

item.title: Semi-Supervised Sparse Gaussian Classification: Provable Benefits of Unlabeled Data
item.description: This study proves that combining labeled and unlabeled data significantly improves high-dimensional sparse Gaussian classification, offering a polynomial-time SSL algorithm that outperforms supervised…
